mixed-citation.article-title: Atlas of European millipedes 3: Order Chordeumatida (Class Diplopoda)

tp:treatment-sec.p: In addition to the 37 SW European species, this family includes Ceratosphys maroccana Mauriès, 1985 , from North Africa (see Mauriès 1985 ). Ceratosphys poculifer is one the few chordeumatidans which have been introduced to Macaronesia, in casu the Canary Islands .
